options.label: A
options.text: Causing miscarriage with the consent of the mother

options.label: B
options.text: Causing miscarriage without the consent of mother

options.label: C
options.text: Death of the mother by act done with the intent to cause miscarriage

options.label: D
options.text: Causing death of the unborn child by an act amounting to culpable homicide

questions.correct_answer: C. Death of the mother by act done with the intent to cause miscarriage

questions.text: White waxy material with preserved facial feature is seen in dead body found in water. What is true about this condition.

options.label: A
options.text: It needs hot weather without humidity

options.label: B
options.text: Is a way of preservation by saponification of fats

questions.correct_answer: B. Is a way of preservation by saponification of fats

questions.text: Which amongst the following is a true statement for diatoms
questions.correct_answer: B. Wall contains silica and chlorophyll

questions.text: A patient came with complaints of nuchal rigidity, and altered consciousness. Lab reports shows tachypnea, hypotension, hypocalcemia, high anion gap acidosis. What is the diagnosis.

questions.correct_answer: A. Formic acid and lactic acid

questions.text: G5L4 woman has 4 daughters. She comes for USG examination and requests for sex determination of her fetus. What will you do?

options.label: A
options.text: Do USG check for congenital abnormality, gestational age and sex. But don’t tell the sex to mother

options.label: B
options.text: Do USG check for congenital abnormality, gestational age and sex. Tell sex to mother

options.label: C
options.text: Do USG-check for congenital abnormality, and gestational age. Don’t check for sex

questions.correct_answer: A. Do USG check for congenital abnormality, gestational age and sex. But don’t tell the sex to mother

options.text: Doctor not liable because he had to save her life in emergency

questions.correct_answer: A. Doctor not liable because he had to save her life in emergency
